title: 【石涛News】「蓬佩奧首次表态：中共国紐約领事馆是主要的间谍中心」，或有更多外交官和间谍被抓捕
contents:
「蓬佩奧首次表態：中共國紐約領事館是主要的間諜中心」並告知紐約郵報：會有更多中共國外交官與間諜被抓捕

Mike Pompeo says China’s New York consulate is major spy hub

WASHINGTON — China’s New York consulate is being used as a major hub for the Communist nation’s US espionage efforts, Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told The Post after an NYPD cop was arrested and charged with spying for the Chinese government.

And it’s likely more diplomats and agents will be arrested, Pompeo told the paper in a sit-down Wednesday.

https://nypost.com/2020/09/24/pompeo-says-ny-chinese-consulate-is-major-spy-hub/
